analyzed: 'di skad brjod pa'i rnam par 'byed pas mi dmigs pa la de rtogs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there is no understanding of that in non-apprehension, as stated by the analysis.

original: 'di nyid la ni de'i skyon 'di yod pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: 'di nyid la ni de'i skyon 'di yod pa ma yin gyi /
translated: This very thing does not have that fault,

original: 'on kyang dngos po rnams la yang ngo //
analyzed: 'on kyang dngos po rnams la yang ngo //
translated: but it is also for things.

original: gal te de la gnod pa med pa rjes su mi sgrub na deng der yang rtogs pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: gal te de la gnod pa med pa rjes su mi sgrub na deng der yang rtogs pa ma yin gyi /
translated: If the non-existence of that is not established, then it is not understood.

original: 'on kyang dngos po rnams la yang ngo //
analyzed: 'on kyang dngos po rnams la yang ngo //
translated: But it is also not the case that things exist.

original: gal te de la gnod pa med pa rjes su sgrub na de 'dir yang rtogs par bya ba'am yang na mngon sum nyid spang bar bya bar 'gyur te spros pas chog go //
analyzed: gal te de la gnod pa med pa rjes su sgrub na de 'dir yang rtogs par bya ba'am yang na mngon sum nyid spang bar bya bar 'gyur te spros pas chog go //
translated: If the non-existence of that is established, then it is understood here, or else direct perception itself would be rejected. Enough of this proliferation!

original: de'i phyir med par rtogs pa'i dngos po gang yin pas rang gi ngo bo dmigs pa de ni de'i 'bras bu las gzhan ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir med par rtogs pa'i dngos po gang yin pas rang gi ngo bo dmigs pa de ni de'i 'bras bu las gzhan ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, the thing that is understood to be non-existent, whose own nature is perceived, is not different from its effect.

original: gal te me med na ma byung ba me yod na yod pa tshad ma du ma'i yul ma yin nam /
analyzed: gal te me med na ma byung ba me yod na yod pa tshad ma du ma'i yul ma yin nam /
translated: If fire does not exist, it does not occur; if fire exists, it exists. Is it not the object of many valid cognitions?

original: des na ji ltar me dmigs pa'i gnas skabs na tshad ma'i yul du ma gyur pa'i phyir @134b phyis kyi dmigs pas gzung ba'i bdag nyid ma grub pa de bzhin du dmigs pa'i gnas skabs na yang byung ba nas med pa'i phyir sngar yod pa'i chos ma grub
analyzed: des na ji ltar me dmigs pa'i gnas skabs na tshad ma'i yul du ma gyur pa'i phyir @134b phyis kyi dmigs pas gzung ba'i bdag nyid ma grub pa de bzhin du dmigs pa'i gnas skabs na yang byung ba nas med pa'i phyir sngar yod pa'i chos ma grub
translated: Therefore, just as when fire is observed, since it is not the object of valid knowledge, the nature of the object of later observation does not exist, in the same way, when the object is observed, since it does not exist after arising, the previously existent object does not exist.

original: pa des na rim gyis 'gyur ba gnyis tshad ma gcig gi yul ma yin pas na med pa gang yin pa de gzhan yod na yod do zhes bya ba 'di ga las yin zhe na /
analyzed: pa des na rim gyis 'gyur ba gnyis tshad ma gcig gi yul ma yin pas na med pa gang yin pa de gzhan yod na yod do zhes bya ba 'di ga las yin zhe na /
translated: Therefore, since the two temporal periods are not the object of a single valid knowledge, how could it be said that ‚Äúwhen the other exists, that which does not exist exists‚Äù?

original: gal te tshad ma nyid yod pa'i dus tsam gyis mthar thug pa yin na ni 'di de ltar 'gyur ba zhig na skad cig tsam yod pa yin yang ji srid 'jal ba rtogs pa po nyid du bsgrubs te /
analyzed: gal te tshad ma nyid yod pa'i dus tsam gyis mthar thug pa yin na ni 'di de ltar 'gyur ba zhig na skad cig tsam yod pa yin yang ji srid 'jal ba rtogs pa po nyid du bsgrubs te /
translated: If valid knowledge itself existed for just a moment, this would be the case. But it exists for only an instant. For as long as it is established as the knower of the object of comprehension,

original: da ltar nyams su myong ba bzhin gsal ba de srid du de tshad ma gcig yin no zhes gzhan du rnam par spros zin to //
analyzed: da ltar nyams su myong ba bzhin gsal ba de srid du de tshad ma gcig yin no zhes gzhan du rnam par spros zin to //
translated: for that long it is a single valid knowledge, as is clear from the experience of the present. This has already been extensively explained elsewhere.

original: rang gi yul la de ltar 'gyur mod /
analyzed: rang gi yul la de ltar 'gyur mod /
translated: It is true that this is so in regard to the object itself.

original: yul gzhan la ni tshad ma gzhan kho na'o //
analyzed: yul gzhan la ni tshad ma gzhan kho na'o //
translated: But in regard to another object, there is only another valid cognition.

original: des na me med par du ba mi 'byung bar rtogs pa gang yin pa de nyid ni de yod na du ba yod pa nyid ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: des na me med par du ba mi 'byung bar rtogs pa gang yin pa de nyid ni de yod na du ba yod pa nyid ma yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that the cognition that smoke does not occur without fire is not the same as the cognition that smoke exists when fire exists,

original: de bden te /
analyzed: de bden te /
translated: we reply that this is true.

original: tshad ma yod pa tsam gyis mthar thug pa ni ma yin gyi /
analyzed: tshad ma yod pa tsam gyis mthar thug pa ni ma yin gyi /
translated: But the existence of valid cognition does not end there.

original: 'on kyang de dang ldan pas byas pa shes pa po'i dngos po khyad par yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang de dang ldan pas byas pa shes pa po'i dngos po khyad par yin no //
translated: Rather, the person who possesses valid cognition is the special entity that knows what is done.

original: de ni tshad ma gzhan gyis bskyed pa yang srid pas chad ma gnyi gas rig pa'i yul gyi rang gi ngo bo shes pas rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po rtogs so //
analyzed: de ni tshad ma gzhan gyis bskyed pa yang srid pas chad ma gnyi gas rig pa'i yul gyi rang gi ngo bo shes pas rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po rtogs so //
translated: Since it is possible that he is produced by another valid cognition, he is the object of both valid cognitions. He knows the nature of the object that is their object. Thus he knows the relation of cause and effect.

original: de bzhin du 'di ni rnam par shes pa la yang nus te /
analyzed: de bzhin du 'di ni rnam par shes pa la yang nus te /
translated: In the same way, he is able to know consciousness.

original: de yang de bzhin du shes pa gzhan gyi rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid du rtogs par nus pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de yang de bzhin du shes pa gzhan gyi rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid du rtogs par nus pa'i phyir ro //
translated: And he is able to know the relation of cause and effect of that consciousness in the same way.

original: gal te tshad ma log kyang de'i yul shes par byed pa'i dngos po zhes bya ba 'di ni ci zhig yin /
analyzed: gal te tshad ma log kyang de'i yul shes par byed pa'i dngos po zhes bya ba 'di ni ci zhig yin /
translated: If a valid cognition is refuted, what is this so-called thing that causes one to understand its object?

original: des byas pa'i 'du byed rjes su 'jug pa'o zhe na /üîΩde lta na 'o na don ji ltar lta ba bzhin myong ba grub kyang myong pa ji lta ba bzhin 'du byed ba can du ma grub pas rtogs pa po de'i gnas skabs su de lta bu'i ngo bo shes par byed pa'i dngos por sgrub bar byed pa
analyzed: des byas pa'i 'du byed rjes su 'jug pa'o zhe na / de lta na 'o na don ji ltar lta ba bzhin myong ba grub kyang myong pa ji lta ba bzhin 'du byed ba can du ma grub pas rtogs pa po de'i gnas skabs su de lta bu'i ngo bo shes par byed pa'i dngos por sgrub bar byed pa
translated: If you say that it is the subsequent engagement of the formative forces that are created by it,

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: then, although the experience of the object just as it is is established, the experience just as it is of the formative forces is not established. Therefore, at the time of the cognizer, the thing that causes one to understand such an entity is not established.

original: sngar 'di na don gzhan yod kyang du ba yod par ma gyur pa las me yod na yod do zhes mi nges so //
analyzed: sngar 'di na don gzhan yod kyang du ba yod par ma gyur pa las me yod na yod do zhes mi nges so //
translated: Previously, even though another object existed, smoke did not exist. But when fire exists, smoke exists.

original: du ba mthong bzhin pa nyid na sngar de med par myong bar snang ba ni med do //
analyzed: du ba mthong bzhin pa nyid na sngar de med par myong bar snang ba ni med do //
translated: But while smoke is being seen, it does not appear that previously it did not exist.

original: des na 'di yod par ma gyur ba las de nye bas da ltar yod do zhes bya ba 'dir ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: des na 'di yod par ma gyur ba las de nye bas da ltar yod do zhes bya ba 'dir ga la 'gyur /
translated: Therefore, how could it be that ‚Äúpreviously it did not exist, but now it exists because it is near‚Äù?

original: 'dis ni dran pa nyams su myong ba'i 'bras bur grub pa yang bsal ba yin no //
analyzed: 'dis ni dran pa nyams su myong ba'i 'bras bur grub pa yang bsal ba yin no //
translated: This also eliminates the establishment of the result of the experience of memory.

original: myong ba 'das kyang myong pa'i rang bzhin du shes pa nyid don ji lta ba bzhin @135a * //
analyzed: myong ba 'das kyang myong pa'i rang bzhin du shes pa nyid don ji lta ba bzhin @135a * //
translated: If it is established that the object is just as it is,

original: rigs par grub na dran pa'i shes pa de'i 'bras bu nyid du 'grub par 'gyur ba zhig na de nyid ni ma grub pa zhes brjod pa yin no zhe na /üîΩbrjod pa / ci 'di mi 'thad kho na'am //
analyzed: rigs par grub na dran pa'i shes pa de'i 'bras bu nyid du 'grub par 'gyur ba zhig na de nyid ni ma grub pa zhes brjod pa yin no zhe na / brjod pa / ci 'di mi 'thad kho na'am //
translated: then the establishment of the result of the cognition of memory would be established. But that itself is not established.üîΩWe say: Is this not tenable at all?

original: 'on te 'di nyid du mi 'thad /
analyzed: 'on te 'di nyid du mi 'thad /
translated: Or is it not tenable in this context?

original: 'dir mi 'thad do zhe na /
analyzed: 'dir mi 'thad do zhe na /
translated: If you say it is not tenable here,

original: de ga las 'du byed rnams skad cig ma yin pa'i phyir dang / dran pa'i rtogs pa yang dngos po'i yul can ma yin pa'i phyir de'i mthus 'du byed rab tu gzhag pa mi 'grub pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: de ga las 'du byed rnams skad cig ma yin pa'i phyir dang / dran pa'i rtogs pa yang dngos po'i yul can ma yin pa'i phyir de'i mthus 'du byed rab tu gzhag pa mi 'grub pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: then it is because formations are momentary and because the realization of memory does not have a real object, so it is not established by its power that formations are posited.

original: de la myong ba yod bzhin pa nyid na dran pa'am 'du byed ma yin no zhes ni rtag par smras pas kyang khas blangs bar bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir myong brtag pa nyid ni yan lag ma yin no //
analyzed: de la myong ba yod bzhin pa nyid na dran pa'am 'du byed ma yin no zhes ni rtag par smras pas kyang khas blangs bar bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir myong brtag pa nyid ni yan lag ma yin no //
translated: And while there is an experience, it is not memory or a formative factor.

original: log na ni 'jal ba po rtag kyang yul lkog tu gyur pa nyid yin pa'i phyir don gyi bdag nyid kyang ngo //
analyzed: log na ni 'jal ba po rtag kyang yul lkog tu gyur pa nyid yin pa'i phyir don gyi bdag nyid kyang ngo //
translated: But if it is refuted, then even though the experiencer is permanent, the object is still hidden.

original: yul la gnas pa'i gsal ba med cing sngar skyes pa yang zhig pa na yul nyid dam 'jal ba po nyid du mi 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yul la gnas pa'i gsal ba med cing sngar skyes pa yang zhig pa na yul nyid dam 'jal ba po nyid du mi 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: And if the object is not present, and the prior object has already ceased, then the object itself or the experiencer is not established.

original: de'i rang bzhin mthong ba med bzhin du 'ga' yang lta ba po'i dngos po ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin mthong ba med bzhin du 'ga' yang lta ba po'i dngos po ma yin no //
translated: Without seeing its nature, it is not the state of the seer.

original: myong ba yang mthong ba las gzhan ma yin te des ni myong ba dang bral na 'jal ba po'i 'jal ba po med pa kho na'o //
analyzed: myong ba yang mthong ba las gzhan ma yin te des ni myong ba dang bral na 'jal ba po'i 'jal ba po med pa kho na'o //
translated: And experience is not different from seeing, because without experience, the experiencer is not an experiencer at all.

original: des na 'dir ni myong ba las dran pa'am /
analyzed: des na 'dir ni myong ba las dran pa'am /
translated: So here, memory is not different from experience.

original: de'i 'du byed pa yin no zhes ga las myong ba gnas bzhin pa na de ltar rnam par 'jog pa zhes bya ba yang mtshungs pa nyid de skad cig ma'i phyogs la yang rgyun gyis 'jug pa nyid kyis rnam par gnas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i 'du byed pa yin no zhes ga las myong ba gnas bzhin pa na de ltar rnam par 'jog pa zhes bya ba yang mtshungs pa nyid de skad cig ma'i phyogs la yang rgyun gyis 'jug pa nyid kyis rnam par gnas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The same applies to the momentary position, because it is present through the engagement of the continuum.

original: des na myong pas dran pa'am /
analyzed: des na myong pas dran pa'am /
translated: Therefore, memory is not observed by experience,

original: dran pas myong ba dmigs pa ni ma yin la /
analyzed: dran pas myong ba dmigs pa ni ma yin la /
translated: nor is experience observed by memory.

original: gnyi ga la dmigs pa'i shes pa gzhan yang med pa'i phyir de yang rgyu dang 'bras bu'i rang bzhin du 'dzin pa ma grub po //
analyzed: gnyi ga la dmigs pa'i shes pa gzhan yang med pa'i phyir de yang rgyu dang 'bras bu'i rang bzhin du 'dzin pa ma grub po //
translated: And because there is no other cognition that observes both, the apprehension of their nature as cause and effect is not established.

original: dran pa yang gal te dngos po'i yul can nyid du 'dod pa yin mod kyi /
analyzed: dran pa yang gal te dngos po'i yul can nyid du 'dod pa yin mod kyi /
translated: If memory is asserted to have an object that is a thing,

original: de lta na yang gal te 'di nyams su myong ba gsal ba nyid dam /
analyzed: de lta na yang gal te 'di nyams su myong ba gsal ba nyid dam /
translated: in that case, if it is the clarity of experience,

original: 'on te de'i yan lag can gyi don yang rung ste rnam pa thams cad du de dran pa nyid nyams par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'on te de'i yan lag can gyi don yang rung ste rnam pa thams cad du de dran pa nyid nyams par 'gyur ro //
translated: or if it is the object that is a part of that, in every way, it is just memory.

original: des na don nam myong ba'i dran pa'i lkog tu gyur pa nyid du brjod par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: des na don nam myong ba'i dran pa'i lkog tu gyur pa nyid du brjod par bya ba yin no //
translated: Therefore, the object or experience is said to be imperceptible.

original: des na mngon sum bzhin du dran pa'i shes pa de ltar rtogs pas de lta bu'i dngos por sgrub pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: des na mngon sum bzhin du dran pa'i shes pa de ltar rtogs pas de lta bu'i dngos por sgrub pa ni ma yin te /
translated: Thus, the object is not established as such by the memory consciousness, which understands it in the same way that perception does.

original: de lta ma yin na rtogs pa thams cad dngos po yod pa'i @135b yul can du smra bas rjes su dpag pa la sogs pa la 'brel pa btsal bar mi bya bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na rtogs pa thams cad dngos po yod pa'i @135b yul can du smra bas rjes su dpag pa la sogs pa la 'brel pa btsal bar mi bya bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Otherwise, since all understanding would be said to have existent things as its objects, one would not have to search for the relation in inference and so on.

original: des na dran pa dngos po'i yul can yin yang /
analyzed: des na dran pa dngos po'i yul can yin yang /
translated: Thus, although memory has an existent thing as its object,

original: myong ba ji lta ba bzhin du skyes par grub pas dngos po'i yul can nyid yin gyi /
analyzed: myong ba ji lta ba bzhin du skyes par grub pas dngos po'i yul can nyid yin gyi /
translated: it is established as arising in accordance with the experience, and so it has an existent thing as its object.

original: mngon sum ltar rtogs pa nyid sbyor ba por gyur pas ni ma yin no //
analyzed: mngon sum ltar rtogs pa nyid sbyor ba por gyur pas ni ma yin no //
translated: But it is not that the object is understood in the same way that perception understands it.

original: myong ba ji lta ba bzhin skyes pa ni 'dir yang ma grub pas na 'di la brgal zhing brtag pa'i yul nyid du bde bar gshegs pa rnams mi rtag par 'dod pa dang / de las gzhan dag mtshungs so //
analyzed: myong ba ji lta ba bzhin skyes pa ni 'dir yang ma grub pas na 'di la brgal zhing brtag pa'i yul nyid du bde bar gshegs pa rnams mi rtag par 'dod pa dang / de las gzhan dag mtshungs so //
translated: The assertion that the TathƒÅgatas are impermanent is the same as the other assertions.

original: gal te lta ba po ma zhig pas sngar mthong ba rjes su rtogs par byed par rigs pa ma yin nam ma zhig kyang mthong ba bzhin skyed pa'i 'du byed med par rjes su 'brel pa mi rigs pa des na ma zhig pa ni yan lag ma yin
analyzed: gal te lta ba po ma zhig pas sngar mthong ba rjes su rtogs par byed par rigs pa ma yin nam ma zhig kyang mthong ba bzhin skyed pa'i 'du byed med par rjes su 'brel pa mi rigs pa des na ma zhig pa ni yan lag ma yin
translated: If it is not tenable that the seer who has not yet ceased sees what was previously seen, then it is not tenable that the seer who has not ceased is related to the arising of seeing without the formative factors. Therefore the seer who has not ceased is not a condition.

original: no // 'du byed yod na ni zhig kyang skyon med do //
analyzed: no // 'du byed yod na ni zhig kyang skyon med do //
translated: If the formative factors exist, then there is no error even if the seer has ceased.

original: myong ba ji lta ba bzhin 'du byed pa yod pas ni de lta bu nyid 'grub pa ma yin no zhes gtan la phab zin to //
analyzed: myong ba ji lta ba bzhin 'du byed pa yod pas ni de lta bu nyid 'grub pa ma yin no zhes gtan la phab zin to //
translated: We have already determined that it is not established that the seer who has not ceased is just as the experience was, because the formative factors exist just as the experience was.

original: dran pa'i shes pa las de lta bu'i dngos por 'gyur ba yang bsal zin to //
analyzed: dran pa'i shes pa las de lta bu'i dngos por 'gyur ba yang bsal zin to //
translated: We have also already refuted the idea that the nature of the seer is like that from the perspective of the consciousness of memory.

original: mthong ba ma zhig na ni dran pos ci yang byar med pa'am /
analyzed: mthong ba ma zhig na ni dran pos ci yang byar med pa'am /
translated: If the seer has not ceased, then memory does nothing at all.

original: ma zhig pa yang rgyun rjes su 'jug pas kyang grub pa yin no //
analyzed: ma zhig pa yang rgyun rjes su 'jug pas kyang grub pa yin no //
translated: And the non-disappearance of the cause is established by the continuation of the series.

original: des na 'dir ni brjod par bya ba yin te /
analyzed: des na 'dir ni brjod par bya ba yin te /
translated: Therefore, here we must speak.

original: 'ga' zhig tu ni rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag gis rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos por 'grub pa yin te //
analyzed: 'ga' zhig tu ni rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag gis rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos por 'grub pa yin te //
translated: In some cases, the relation of cause and effect is established by positive and negative concomitance.

original: dper na du ba dang / myu gu dang 'bras chan la sogs pa bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na du ba dang / myu gu dang 'bras chan la sogs pa bzhin no //
translated: For example, smoke and fire, and rice and its sprout.

original: 'ga' zhig tu ni de ltar grub pa med kyang rigs pas de ltar 'grub ste /
analyzed: 'ga' zhig tu ni de ltar grub pa med kyang rigs pas de ltar 'grub ste /
translated: In some cases, even though that is not established, it is established by reasoning.

original: dper na khyad par dang dngos po la sogs pa la lhan cig byed pa dag bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na khyad par dang dngos po la sogs pa la lhan cig byed pa dag bzhin no //
translated: For example, the cooperative conditions of a particular thing and so on.

original: des na 'bras bu gzhan dang mi 'dra ba'i rtogs pa 'dis rang gi rgyu khyad par can rjes su dpog par byed kyi rgyu nus pa tsam ni ma yin no //
analyzed: des na 'bras bu gzhan dang mi 'dra ba'i rtogs pa 'dis rang gi rgyu khyad par can rjes su dpog par byed kyi rgyu nus pa tsam ni ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, this cognition of the effect, which is unlike any other, infers its special cause, but not merely a cause with the capacity .

original: 'di ltar dran pa 'khrul par gyur pas kyang de lta bu'i ngo bor nges pa de lta bu'i myong ba rjes su dpog par byed do //
analyzed: 'di ltar dran pa 'khrul par gyur pas kyang de lta bu'i ngo bor nges pa de lta bu'i myong ba rjes su dpog par byed do //
translated: Thus, even a mistaken memory infers such an experience, which is ascertained to have such a nature.

original: 'khrul pa nyid du khyad par med kyang so sor nges pa 'ga' zhig tu sngon med pa rtogs pa skye la gzhan du ni sngar myong ba nyid du yang ma yin no //
analyzed: 'khrul pa nyid du khyad par med kyang so sor nges pa 'ga' zhig tu sngon med pa rtogs pa skye la gzhan du ni sngar myong ba nyid du yang ma yin no //
translated: Although there is no difference in error, in some cases a cognition arises that did not exist before, but in other cases it is not as if one had experienced it before.

original: dmigs pa med pa nyid kyis na 'khrul pa yul sgrub par byed pa ma yin mod /
analyzed: dmigs pa med pa nyid kyis na 'khrul pa yul sgrub par byed pa ma yin mod /
translated: Since it is non-apprehension, error does not establish an object.

original: rgyu med par mi srid pa'i phyir rgyu nges pa ni gsal bar byed pa kho na'o //üîΩdes na rgyu khyad par @136a * //
analyzed: rgyu med par mi srid pa'i phyir rgyu nges pa ni gsal bar byed pa kho na'o // des na rgyu khyad par @136a * //
translated: But since it is not possible without a cause, the ascertainment of the cause is only a clarification.

original: med na 'khrul pa mi 'dra bar ji ltar 'gyur /
analyzed: med na 'khrul pa mi 'dra bar ji ltar 'gyur /
translated: Therefore, if there is no difference in the cause, how can error be different?

original: de bzhin du la la ni sngon po'i shes pa nyid nges pa yin la /
analyzed: de bzhin du la la ni sngon po'i shes pa nyid nges pa yin la /
translated: In the same way, in some cases the cognition of blue itself is ascertained,

original: gzhan la ni ser po shes pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa rjes su rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan la ni ser po shes pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa rjes su rtogs par bya'o //
translated: and in others the cognition of yellow, etc. is ascertained.

original: de bas na nyams su myong ba de lta bu las skyes pa'i dran pa'i 'du byed las skyes pa na de ltar gyur pa yin no //
analyzed: de bas na nyams su myong ba de lta bu las skyes pa'i dran pa'i 'du byed las skyes pa na de ltar gyur pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, when memory arises from the formative forces born from such an experience, it is just as it was.

original: de lta na yang rgyu tsam rtogs par 'gyur gyi khyad par ni rtogs pa ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de lta na yang rgyu tsam rtogs par 'gyur gyi khyad par ni rtogs pa ma yin no zhe na /
translated: But even if that is so, one would understand the mere cause, but not the specific property.

original: brjod pa khyad par nyid dang 'brel pa mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: brjod pa khyad par nyid dang 'brel pa mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: We reply: Because we see the connection with the specific property.

original: 'di ltar de dag gi 'brel pa myong ba med par ni du ba la me rtogs par rigs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar de dag gi 'brel pa myong ba med par ni du ba la me rtogs par rigs pa ma yin no //
translated: Thus, without experiencing their connection, it is not reasonable to understand fire from smoke.

original: des na rjes su dpag pa'i dus na du ba tsam nyid mthong gi me dang 'brel pa myong ba ni med do //
analyzed: des na rjes su dpag pa'i dus na du ba tsam nyid mthong gi me dang 'brel pa myong ba ni med do //
translated: Therefore, when one infers, one sees only smoke, but one does not experience the connection with fire.

original: des na sngon nyams su myong ba'i gzhi las dran pas nyams su myong ba rjes su rtogs pas nyams su myong ba'i bya ba byed pa yin no //
analyzed: des na sngon nyams su myong ba'i gzhi las dran pas nyams su myong ba rjes su rtogs pas nyams su myong ba'i bya ba byed pa yin no //
translated: Thus, memory, which is based on a prior experience, understands the experience, and so it performs the function of experience.

original: gal te du ba me la myong ba med na de de ltar dran pa na me brtags te 'jug pas me 'thob par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te du ba me la myong ba med na de de ltar dran pa na me brtags te 'jug pas me 'thob par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: If one did not experience smoke as connected with fire, then when one remembered it in that way, one would not obtain fire, because one would not focus on fire.

original: des na dran pa'i sgo nas rnam par gnas pa'i myong ba ni rjes su dpag pa'i rgyu nyid kyis ltos par bya ba dang don ji lta ba yin te thob pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: des na dran pa'i sgo nas rnam par gnas pa'i myong ba ni rjes su dpag pa'i rgyu nyid kyis ltos par bya ba dang don ji lta ba yin te thob pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Therefore, the experience of abiding through memory is the object of dependence by the cause of inference, because it is obtained as it is.

original: bden te myong ba ni ltos par bya ba kho na'o //
analyzed: bden te myong ba ni ltos par bya ba kho na'o //
translated: It is true that experience is only the object of dependence.

original: sbyor ba'i dus na ni de gyur du zin kyang sngon byung bar gyur to zhes grub pa ma yin no //
analyzed: sbyor ba'i dus na ni de gyur du zin kyang sngon byung bar gyur to zhes grub pa ma yin no //
translated: Even though it has already occurred at the time of application, it is not established that it has occurred previously.

original: dran pa ni myong bar 'khrul pas rjes su dpag pa 'jug par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: dran pa ni myong bar 'khrul pas rjes su dpag pa 'jug par byed pa yin no //
translated: Memory is the cause of the engagement of inference because it is mistaken about experience.

original: ji ltar rjes su dpag pa lta bu'i don thob pa ni 'dod rgyal ba'i mi slu ba yin no //
analyzed: ji ltar rjes su dpag pa lta bu'i don thob pa ni 'dod rgyal ba'i mi slu ba yin no //
translated: The obtainment of the object as it is inferred is a nondeceptive whim.

original: ma yin te lan cig ma yin par yod pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: ma yin te lan cig ma yin par yod pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: If it is said that it is not so, because it exists more than once,

original: don de lta ma yin par ma grub nas lan cig ma yin par yod par yang yan lag ma yin no //
analyzed: don de lta ma yin par ma grub nas lan cig ma yin par yod par yang yan lag ma yin no //
translated: it is not a part that it exists more than once, without establishing that the object is not so.

original: rang nyid 'dod pa yang yin te khyab pa sgrub pa la sogs pa dag tu lan cig ma yin par myong ba yan lag ma yin par byas pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: rang nyid 'dod pa yang yin te khyab pa sgrub pa la sogs pa dag tu lan cig ma yin par myong ba yan lag ma yin par byas pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: And it is also what one desires, because in the proof of pervasion and so on, it is not the case that it is not experienced more than once.

original: 'di la brjod pa rnam par rtog pa nyams su myong ba'i rtsa ba can ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di la brjod pa rnam par rtog pa nyams su myong ba'i rtsa ba can ma yin te /
translated: To this we reply: Conceptual thought does not have the experience of the root.

original: de'i dus can gyi rgyu mtshan nye ba tsam las skye ba yin na rnam par rtog pa nyid ma yin par thal ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: de'i dus can gyi rgyu mtshan nye ba tsam las skye ba yin na rnam par rtog pa nyid ma yin par thal ba'i phyir te /
translated: If it were to arise merely from the proximity of the reason that is its object, it would follow that it is not conceptual thought,

original: rab rib dang dbang po la sogs pas bskyed pa'i log pa'i shes pa dang / bzlog pa dag bzhin no //
analyzed: rab rib dang dbang po la sogs pas bskyed pa'i log pa'i shes pa dang / bzlog pa dag bzhin no //
translated: because it is like the false cognition produced by cataracts and the sense faculties and so on.

original: des na rnam par rtog pa'i rang bzhin brtag pas ji lta bu'i @136b rgyu mtshan med par 'di mi srid pa'i rgyu mtshan de nyid rtogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des na rnam par rtog pa'i rang bzhin brtag pas ji lta bu'i @136b rgyu mtshan med par 'di mi srid pa'i rgyu mtshan de nyid rtogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, by investigating the nature of conceptual thought, one will understand the reason why it is impossible for it to exist without an object.

original: 'dir rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag med pa'i phyir 'di ltar yang ci ste mi 'gyur ba zhes bya bar ni brtag par mi nus te srid pa dang / thar pa dag pa dag tu lta ba dang de med pa'i rgyu can las gzhan du brtag par mi nus pa bzhin no //
analyzed: 'dir rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag med pa'i phyir 'di ltar yang ci ste mi 'gyur ba zhes bya bar ni brtag par mi nus te srid pa dang / thar pa dag pa dag tu lta ba dang de med pa'i rgyu can las gzhan du brtag par mi nus pa bzhin no //
translated: But it is not possible to imagine that it is like this, because there is no concomitance or reversal. It is not possible to imagine that liberation and the view of purity are other than the cause of their absence.

original: 'di ltar nyams su myong bas 'du byed bskyed pas shes pa po shes par byed pa nyid kyis dngos por grub pa na rang 'dod tsam gyis de sad pas de lta bu'i rtogs pa rang dbang du gyur pa'i phyir shes pa gang dag skye ba de dag de
analyzed: 'di ltar nyams su myong bas 'du byed bskyed pas shes pa po shes par byed pa nyid kyis dngos por grub pa na rang 'dod tsam gyis de sad pas de lta bu'i rtogs pa rang dbang du gyur pa'i phyir shes pa gang dag skye ba de dag de
translated: Thus, when the experiencer is established as a real entity by the production of the formative forces, by the act of knowing, and by the act of making known, then, by the mere desire of that one, that kind of understanding becomes independent. Therefore, whatever consciousness arises,

original: lta bu'i 'du byed kyi gzhi can nyid kyis snga ma dang phyi mar 'dzin par 'gyur ba ni /
analyzed: lta bu'i 'du byed kyi gzhi can nyid kyis snga ma dang phyi mar 'dzin par 'gyur ba ni /
translated: it is the basis of the formative forces, and so it becomes the apprehension of the prior and subsequent existences.

original: rnam par rtog pa dang bcas par grub par 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa dang bcas par grub par 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: It is thus established as conceptual.

original: de'i dus pa'i rung ba tsam las skyes pa'i gsal ba ni dmigs pa yod dam med kyang rung ste /
analyzed: de'i dus pa'i rung ba tsam las skyes pa'i gsal ba ni dmigs pa yod dam med kyang rung ste /
translated: The manifestation that arises from mere suitability at that time has an objective support, whether it exists or not.

original: snga phyi rnam par 'byed par mi nus pas rnam par mi rtog pa kho na'o //
analyzed: snga phyi rnam par 'byed par mi nus pas rnam par mi rtog pa kho na'o //
translated: because it is impossible to distinguish earlier and later moments, it is only non-conceptual.

original: 'khrul ba'i rgyu mtshan 'ga' zhig nyid de lta bu'i rtogs pa skyed par byed pa yin no zhe na ma yin te mi shes pa las med pas shes pa la ltos pa nyid du rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'khrul ba'i rgyu mtshan 'ga' zhig nyid de lta bu'i rtogs pa skyed par byed pa yin no zhe na ma yin te mi shes pa las med pas shes pa la ltos pa nyid du rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: If you say that some sort of unreal causal sign produces such a cognition, no, because it is understood that it depends on consciousness, since it does not exist without it.

original: mi shes pa la med par ji ltar rtogs she na /
analyzed: mi shes pa la med par ji ltar rtogs she na /
translated: How is it understood that it does not exist without ignorance?

original: rnam par rtog pa thams cad mi 'jig pa'i phyir dang / nges pa med pas dran par thal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa thams cad mi 'jig pa'i phyir dang / nges pa med pas dran par thal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because all conceptual thoughts are not destroyed and because it follows that there would be memory without certainty.

original: de lta bu nyams su myong ba yod na ni de nges pa nyid las nges pa yin no //
analyzed: de lta bu nyams su myong ba yod na ni de nges pa nyid las nges pa yin no //
translated: If there were such an experience, it would be certainty only from certainty.üîΩMoreover, the various potencies of such things as seeds to produce the various results such as rice are generated by the individual causes, so it is tenable that they have such natures.

original: gzhan yang sa bon la sogs pa'i don rnams kyi 'bras s'a lu la sogs pa'i dbye ba'i nus pa sna tshogs srid pa ni rgyu so sor nges pas bskyed pas de lta bu'i ngo bor 'thad pa yin la sngon po dang ser po la sogs pas dbang po
analyzed: gzhan yang sa bon la sogs pa'i don rnams kyi 'bras s'a lu la sogs pa'i dbye ba'i nus pa sna tshogs srid pa ni rgyu so sor nges pas bskyed pas de lta bu'i ngo bor 'thad pa yin la sngon po dang ser po la sogs pas dbang po
translated: The various potencies of such things as seeds to produce the various results such as rice are generated by the individual causes, so it is tenable that they have such natures.

original: las skyes pa'i blo sna tshogs pa yang phyi'i don yod na de byas pa kho na yin na /üîΩrnam par rtog pa yod pa dang med pa dang bum pa dang chu dang rtsig pa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin gyis rigs mi mthun bar snang ba go nus pa'i gzhi rtsa gang las de lta ba gyur bum pa'i rnam par rtog pa skyed par byed pa'i rtogs
analyzed: las skyes pa'i blo sna tshogs pa yang phyi'i don yod na de byas pa kho na yin na / rnam par rtog pa yod pa dang med pa dang bum pa dang chu dang rtsig pa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin gyis rigs mi mthun bar snang ba go nus pa'i gzhi rtsa gang las de lta ba gyur bum pa'i rnam par rtog pa skyed par byed pa'i rtogs
translated: Also, the various cognitions produced by karma would be the effects of external objects alone if external objects existed.üîΩBut the various cognitions of things that are existent or nonexistent, such as a pot, water, a wall, and so on, are not the effects of external objects.

original: pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po dang dngos po med pa la sogs pa'i rgyur me yin te /
analyzed: pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po dang dngos po med pa la sogs pa'i rgyur me yin te /
translated: The cause of the various cognitions of things that are existent or nonexistent, such as a pot, water, a wall, and so on, is not external objects, because the nature of the cognition that produces the cognition of a pot is not a cause of things that are existent or nonexistent, and so on.

original: rtogs pa de yod kyang bum pa rtogs pa med na /
analyzed: rtogs pa de yod kyang bum pa rtogs pa med na /
translated: If the cognition of a pot did not exist even though the cognition of a thing that is existent or nonexistent, such as a pot, water, a wall, and so on, existed,

original: de de'i rgyu ma yin par thal pa'i phyir ro //üîΩ'bad rtsol gyis byas @137a * //
analyzed: de de'i rgyu ma yin par thal pa'i phyir ro // 'bad rtsol gyis byas @137a * //
translated: then it would follow that the cognition of a thing that is existent or nonexistent, such as a pot, water, a wall, and so on, would not be the cause of the cognition of a pot.

original: pa'i nus pas dpal la brten pas de ltar 'gyur ba yang mi rigs te de lta bu'i nus pa can gyi rgyu yod pa nyid brtsal bar bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: pa'i nus pas dpal la brten pas de ltar 'gyur ba yang mi rigs te de lta bu'i nus pa can gyi rgyu yod pa nyid brtsal bar bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is also illogical that the cognition of a pot arises from the potential that is produced by effort, because the existence of a cause that has such a potential must be sought.

original: de'i phyir dngos po sna tshogs pa bzhin du de nyams su myong ba sna tshogs pa yin pa'i phyir sna tshogs par gyur pa'i nyams su myong ba'i bag chags sna tshogs can gyi rnam par rtog par byed pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: de'i phyir dngos po sna tshogs pa bzhin du de nyams su myong ba sna tshogs pa yin pa'i phyir sna tshogs par gyur pa'i nyams su myong ba'i bag chags sna tshogs can gyi rnam par rtog par byed pa'i phyir te /
translated: Therefore, because the experience of it is various, like the various things, it is a conceptual thought that has various latent predispositions of experience.

original: spros pas chog go //
analyzed: spros pas chog go //
translated: Enough of this elaboration!

original: des na yul gsal bar byed pa'i nus pa dang ldan pa rang nyid kyis gsal ba mthong ba 'di ni sngon po'o snyam pa la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa dus kyi bye brag mi gsal ba nyid kyis dran pa'i dngos por rtogs pa la mi gnas pa
analyzed: des na yul gsal bar byed pa'i nus pa dang ldan pa rang nyid kyis gsal ba mthong ba 'di ni sngon po'o snyam pa la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa dus kyi bye brag mi gsal ba nyid kyis dran pa'i dngos por rtogs pa la mi gnas pa
translated: Thus, this seeing of the clear itself, which possesses the capacity to illuminate the object, is not a thing that is realized in the recollection of the thought ‚ÄúThis is blue,‚Äù etc., because the particular time is not clear.

original: ni nyams su myong ba'i 'du byed bar chad med pa rtogs par byed pa des na don ji lta ba nyams su myong ba de lta bu yin la de ltar ni 'du byed pa yin no //
analyzed: ni nyams su myong ba'i 'du byed bar chad med pa rtogs par byed pa des na don ji lta ba nyams su myong ba de lta bu yin la de ltar ni 'du byed pa yin no //
translated: It is the realization of the uninterrupted formative force of experience. Therefore, it is the experience of the object as it is, and it is the formative force as it is.

original: de'i phyir rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po dang de 'dzin pa rigs pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po dang de 'dzin pa rigs pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is reasonable that it and the apprehension of it are the relation of cause and effect.

original: 'di la stong pa nyid du smra ba dag gis bzod pa bzhin du don rnams ma skyes pa dang mi 'gag par ni ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di la stong pa nyid du smra ba dag gis bzod pa bzhin du don rnams ma skyes pa dang mi 'gag par ni ma yin te /
translated: Here, the Proponents of Emptiness, like the patient ones, do not assert that things are not produced and do not cease.

original: rnam par rig pa tsam ni skye ba dang 'gag pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam par rig pa tsam ni skye ba dang 'gag pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because mere awareness has the nature of being produced and ceasing.

original: de nyid kyi phyir gal te thams cad nus pa med na zhes bkod de //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir gal te thams cad nus pa med na zhes bkod de //
translated: Therefore, if all things are without power, the passage, ‚ÄúIf you see the power of seeds, etc.

original: sa bon sogs ni myug sogs la //üîΩnus mthong gal te de kun rdzog /üîΩ'dod na zhes bya bas phyi rol gyi don la brten nas de ltar mthong bar bstan pa la /
analyzed: sa bon sogs ni myug sogs la // nus mthong gal te de kun rdzog / 'dod na zhes bya bas phyi rol gyi don la brten nas de ltar mthong bar bstan pa la /
translated: with regard to sprouts, etc.,üîΩyou will accept the relative,‚Äù is set forth.üîΩThe meaning of the passage is that if you see the power of external objects, you will accept the existence of external objects.

original: mthong ba de kun rdzob pa'i don gyi yul can du rnam par gzhag ste /
analyzed: mthong ba de kun rdzob pa'i don gyi yul can du rnam par gzhag ste /
translated: The seeing of the power of external objects is posited as the perception of the object of the relative.üîΩBecause it is not tenable that the relative does not exist, the entities of cause and effect exist in the nature of the relative.

original: kun rdzob med par mi 'thad pa'i phyir kun rdzob kyi ngo bor yang rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po yod pa nyid do snyam du dgongs nas ji ltar de ltar 'gyur zhes phyis khas blangs pa yin no //
analyzed: kun rdzob med par mi 'thad pa'i phyir kun rdzob kyi ngo bor yang rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po yod pa nyid do snyam du dgongs nas ji ltar de ltar 'gyur zhes phyis khas blangs pa yin no //
translated: Thinking this, he later accepts the passage, ‚ÄúHow could it be otherwise?‚Äù

original: de'i phyir ma byung ba'i rang bzhin las yod pa tsam ni skye ba yin la de rtogs pa las de yod pas yod par dmigs pa gang yin pa de ni rtogs pa yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir ma byung ba'i rang bzhin las yod pa tsam ni skye ba yin la de rtogs pa las de yod pas yod par dmigs pa gang yin pa de ni rtogs pa yin te /
translated: Therefore, arising is the mere existence of an existent from a nature that has not yet arisen. That which is the observation of existence due to the realization of that is the realization of that.

original: des na rgyu dang 'bras bu dang de'i rtogs pa mtshang ba med pa yin pas /
analyzed: des na rgyu dang 'bras bu dang de'i rtogs pa mtshang ba med pa yin pas /
translated: Therefore, cause and effect and the realization of that are not contradictory.

original: mngon sum dang mi dmigs pa sgrub par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: mngon sum dang mi dmigs pa sgrub par byed pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, direct perception and nonobservation are the proof.

original: 'o na de la gcig med na yang zhes bya ba 'di ci ste mi brjod ce na rgyu 'di tsam nyid do zhes nges pa gzung ba'i don du brjod do //
analyzed: 'o na de la gcig med na yang zhes bya ba 'di ci ste mi brjod ce na rgyu 'di tsam nyid do zhes nges pa gzung ba'i don du brjod do //
translated: If that is so, why is the phrase ‚Äúeven if one does not exist‚Äù not stated? It is stated in order to ascertain that this is the sole cause.

original: 'di ltar du ma cig car nye ba las 'bras bu skye bar dmigs pa'am /
analyzed: 'di ltar du ma cig car nye ba las 'bras bu skye bar dmigs pa'am /
translated: In this way, the effect is observed to arise from the simultaneous proximity of many causes or from the gradual proximity of many causes.

original: yang na rim gyis nye ba las yin te /
analyzed: yang na rim gyis nye ba las yin te /
translated: Or, the effect arises from the gradual proximity of many causes.

original: sngar nye bar gnas @137b pa yod kyang med pa'i 'bras bu phyis nye bar 'ong bas ltos pa yongs su rdzogs par byas pa'i phyir de nye ba nyid kyis skyed pa yin no //
analyzed: sngar nye bar gnas @137b pa yod kyang med pa'i 'bras bu phyis nye bar 'ong bas ltos pa yongs su rdzogs par byas pa'i phyir de nye ba nyid kyis skyed pa yin no //
translated: The effect that previously existed but did not exist arises later due to the completion of the reliance on the proximity of the cause.

original: des na gcig gam du ma ji ltar nye ba nyid kyis 'bras bu bskyed dam /
analyzed: des na gcig gam du ma ji ltar nye ba nyid kyis 'bras bu bskyed dam /
translated: Therefore, it is uncertain whether the effect is generated by the mere presence of the one or the many.

original: de sngar nye bar gnas pa dag la de nye bar ltos pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pas yin zhes the tshom za ba phyis kyi mi dmigs pas bzlog pa yin no //
analyzed: de sngar nye bar gnas pa dag la de nye bar ltos pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pas yin zhes the tshom za ba phyis kyi mi dmigs pas bzlog pa yin no //
translated: But later non-observation refutes the claim that the effect is generated by the presence of the one or the many, since the presence of the one or the many is completed by the presence of the effect.

original: dmigs pa de dag las gcig med na yang mi dmigs pa yin no //
analyzed: dmigs pa de dag las gcig med na yang mi dmigs pa yin no //
translated: If any one of those observed is absent, it is not observed.

original: 'di ltar me yod pa na bud shing med na me yod par mthong yang du ba med pa /
analyzed: 'di ltar me yod pa na bud shing med na me yod par mthong yang du ba med pa /
translated: Thus, when fire is present, if fuel is absent, fire is not seen, but smoke is.

original: de bzhin du bud shing la yang me med na med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du bud shing la yang me med na med par 'gyur ro //
translated: Similarly, if fire is absent, fuel is also absent.

original: de gnyis gnas na ni gzhan med kyang mi ldog go //
analyzed: de gnyis gnas na ni gzhan med kyang mi ldog go //
translated: But if both are present, the absence of the other is not negated.

original: des na de ltar de dag yod na sngar ma byung ba'i du ba yod pa las de de dag gi rgyu can du rtogs pa na /
analyzed: des na de ltar de dag yod na sngar ma byung ba'i du ba yod pa las de de dag gi rgyu can du rtogs pa na /
translated: Thus, when they are present, smoke is present, which was not present before. Since it is understood that smoke is caused by them,

original: rgyu'i tshogs pa gang zhig nye ba na de yod pa de ci nye bar gnas pa rnams kyi kha skong yin nam 'on te de dag las don 'ga' zhig rgyu ma yin pa yang yin zhes nges pa na 'di ltar rtogs pa yin no //
analyzed: rgyu'i tshogs pa gang zhig nye ba na de yod pa de ci nye bar gnas pa rnams kyi kha skong yin nam 'on te de dag las don 'ga' zhig rgyu ma yin pa yang yin zhes nges pa na 'di ltar rtogs pa yin no //
translated: When it is ascertained that the presence of a cause-set is the complement of the presence of its effect, then it is understood that some of the causes are not causes of that effect.

original: 'bras bu nyid de yang du ba la yod do //
analyzed: 'bras bu nyid de yang du ba la yod do //
translated: And the effect itself is present in smoke.

original: des na ji ltar du bas me mi 'khrul lo zhes rtogs zhes gang brjod pa de 'dis spangs pa yin no //
analyzed: des na ji ltar du bas me mi 'khrul lo zhes rtogs zhes gang brjod pa de 'dis spangs pa yin no //
translated: So how can it be understood that fire is not mistaken with respect to smoke? This is what is refuted by this.

original: des na de ltar re zhig 'bras bu'i 'bras bu nyid 'khrul pa med do zhes bstan pa'i phyir tshad mas rtogs pa'i 'bras bu nyid bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: des na de ltar re zhig 'bras bu'i 'bras bu nyid 'khrul pa med do zhes bstan pa'i phyir tshad mas rtogs pa'i 'bras bu nyid bshad pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, in order to show that in this way the effect of an effect is not mistaken, the effect of the valid cognition is explained.

original: de ni 'di las ji ltar 'khrul pa med pa de bstan pa'i de med par yang zhes smos so //
analyzed: de ni 'di las ji ltar 'khrul pa med pa de bstan pa'i de med par yang zhes smos so //
translated: In order to show how it is non-mistaken with respect to that, he says, ‚ÄúEven when that is absent.‚Äù

original: med par yang du ba de yod na de la 'khrul nas de med kyang yod na rgyu dang ldan pa las 'das par 'gyur te de'i 'bras bu nyid du mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: med par yang du ba de yod na de la 'khrul nas de med kyang yod na rgyu dang ldan pa las 'das par 'gyur te de'i 'bras bu nyid du mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: If smoke existed without fire, then one could be mistaken about it, and even if it did not exist, it would be beyond having a cause, and it would not be the effect of that. This is the meaning.

original: de'i don 'di yin te /
analyzed: de'i don 'di yin te /
translated: This is the meaning:

original: du ba ni 'bras bu yin te me'i 'bras bu'i chos mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: du ba ni 'bras bu yin te me'i 'bras bu'i chos mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Smoke is the effect, because the property of being the effect of fire is seen.

original: 'bras bu yang mi 'khrul ba dang de'i bdag nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyis 'brel te /
analyzed: 'bras bu yang mi 'khrul ba dang de'i bdag nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyis 'brel te /
translated: And the effect is related to that by the nature of non-deception and having the same nature.

original: des na ji ltar du bas me la mi 'khrul lo zhes bya bar rtogs zhes gang brjod pa spangs pa yin te rnam pa 'dis rgyu dang 'bras bu'i rang bzhin rnam par dpyad pa kho na las khong du chud pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: des na ji ltar du bas me la mi 'khrul lo zhes bya bar rtogs zhes gang brjod pa spangs pa yin te rnam pa 'dis rgyu dang 'bras bu'i rang bzhin rnam par dpyad pa kho na las khong du chud pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Therefore, how could smoke not be non-deceptive with respect to fire? This is what is said. This aspect is understood only through the analysis of the nature of cause and effect.

original: ma byung ba nyid las yod pas yod pa'i dngos po ni skye ba zhes brjod do //
analyzed: ma byung ba nyid las yod pas yod pa'i dngos po ni skye ba zhes brjod do //
translated: An existent thing that exists from a non-existent state is called arisen.

original: de yang gdon mi za bar nus pa'i dngos po gzhan la ltos par bya ba yin te /
analyzed: de yang gdon mi za bar nus pa'i dngos po gzhan la ltos par bya ba yin te /
translated: And that must certainly depend on another thing that has the capacity.

original: des na 'di @138a * //
analyzed: des na 'di @138a * //
translated: Therefore,

original: gang gi tshe gzhan gyi tshe yang yod na ni de'i tshe skye ba'i don nyid med de /
analyzed: gang gi tshe gzhan gyi tshe yang yod na ni de'i tshe skye ba'i don nyid med de /
translated: if it exists at the time of the other, then at that time there is no meaning of arising.

original: ji ltar lhas byin khyim du byung nas phyir 'byung bar 'gyur la /
analyzed: ji ltar lhas byin khyim du byung nas phyir 'byung bar 'gyur la /
translated: Just as when Devadatta comes out of the house and goes outside,

original: der byung nas kyang yul gzhan du 'byung bas de dang de'i rgyun mngon par skye bar mi brjod pa bzhin no //
analyzed: der byung nas kyang yul gzhan du 'byung bas de dang de'i rgyun mngon par skye bar mi brjod pa bzhin no //
translated: and having gone there, he goes to another place, his continuum is not said to arise.

original: dngos po med pa'i sngon du 'gro ba can nyid yod pa ni skye ba yin no //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i sngon du 'gro ba can nyid yod pa ni skye ba yin no //
translated: The existence of that which precedes the non-existent is arising.

original: des na gang gi tshe 'di med par 'byung ba de'i tshe skye ba'i don nyid med pa de las 'byung ba ga las 'gyur /
analyzed: des na gang gi tshe 'di med par 'byung ba de'i tshe skye ba'i don nyid med pa de las 'byung ba ga las 'gyur /
translated: Therefore, when it occurs without that, at that time there is no meaning of arising. How could it arise from that?

original: me med par yang du ba yod de /
analyzed: me med par yang du ba yod de /
translated: Smoke exists without fire.

original: des na 'di me yod na snga na med pa yod pa thob pa ma yin pas de yod pas skye ba ma yin no //
analyzed: des na 'di me yod na snga na med pa yod pa thob pa ma yin pas de yod pas skye ba ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, when fire exists, it does not obtain what did not exist before, so it does not arise from that.

original: des na du ba me'i rgyu can ma yin no //
analyzed: des na du ba me'i rgyu can ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, smoke is not caused by fire.

original: de'i phyir rgyu med par thal lo //
analyzed: de'i phyir rgyu med par thal lo //
translated: Therefore, it follows that it is without cause.

original: ci zhig ltar du ba me yod na dmigs pa de tsam gyis ni de'i 'bras bur mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ci zhig ltar du ba me yod na dmigs pa de tsam gyis ni de'i 'bras bur mi 'gyur ro //
translated: But just by observing that smoke exists when fire exists, it is not established that smoke is the effect of fire.

original: gal te thams cad du du ba dang thams cad kyi tshe 'di me yod na 'byung pa yin no zhes nges na /
analyzed: gal te thams cad du du ba dang thams cad kyi tshe 'di me yod na 'byung pa yin no zhes nges na /
translated: If it were certain that smoke always occurs and only occurs when fire is present,

original: de'i tshe ni 'bras bu nyid du rtogs bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: de'i tshe ni 'bras bu nyid du rtogs bar 'gyur te /
translated: then at that time it would be understood as the effect,

original: de la nges par rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la nges par rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is ascertained in that way.

original: 'di ni thams cad mthong ba ma yin pas rtogs par nus pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni thams cad mthong ba ma yin pas rtogs par nus pa ma yin no //
translated: But since this is not seen in all cases, it cannot be understood.üîΩTherefore, how can it be understood as the effect merely by observing what was not previously observed?

original: des na ji ltar sngar ma dmigs pa dmigs pa tsam gyis 'bras bu nyid du rtogs des na 'bras bu nyid la rtsod pa dang bcas pa na /
analyzed: des na ji ltar sngar ma dmigs pa dmigs pa tsam gyis 'bras bu nyid du rtogs des na 'bras bu nyid la rtsod pa dang bcas pa na /
translated: When the effect is disputed,

original: ji ltar me med par yang yod pa'i phyir rgyu dang ldan pa las 'das par 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar me med par yang yod pa'i phyir rgyu dang ldan pa las 'das par 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: how can it be beyond having a cause, because it exists even when fire does not exist?

original: bshad pa / lan cig de lta bu'i ngo bor nges pa'i du ba me yod pa la mthong bas kyang me de'i 'bras bur 'grub bo //
analyzed: bshad pa / lan cig de lta bu'i ngo bor nges pa'i du ba me yod pa la mthong bas kyang me de'i 'bras bur 'grub bo //
translated: In response, it is said: Even by seeing smoke that is ascertained to have that nature when fire exists, it is established as the effect of that fire.

original: re zhig du ba de med pa nyid las de'i tshe yod pas skyes par ni rtogs pa yin no //
analyzed: re zhig du ba de med pa nyid las de'i tshe yod pas skyes par ni rtogs pa yin no //
translated: For a while, it is understood that smoke is produced when it exists at that time, having been nonexistent.

original: 'di ni nus pa gzhan med par rang nyid kyis 'byung ba ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di ni nus pa gzhan med par rang nyid kyis 'byung ba ma yin te /
translated: This is not produced by itself without another capacity,

original: rang bzhin med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang bzhin med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it lacks an intrinsic nature.

original: nus pa yang rgyu yod pa kho na yin no //
analyzed: nus pa yang rgyu yod pa kho na yin no //
translated: And a capacity exists only when there is a cause.

original: de las gzhan dag yod kyang med pa'i phyir dang / me yod na yod pa'i phyir de de'i 'bras bu de rtogs so //
analyzed: de las gzhan dag yod kyang med pa'i phyir dang / me yod na yod pa'i phyir de de'i 'bras bu de rtogs so //
translated: It is understood that it is the effect of that, because it exists when that exists and does not exist when that does not exist, even though other things exist.

original: gang gi tshe de dag yod pa nyid na rgyu gzhan la mi ltog par dus gzhan nyid du 'byung ba de'i tshe ni yongs su 'gyur ba la ltos pa rnams skyed par byed pa yin par rtogs te /
analyzed: gang gi tshe de dag yod pa nyid na rgyu gzhan la mi ltog par dus gzhan nyid du 'byung ba de'i tshe ni yongs su 'gyur ba la ltos pa rnams skyed par byed pa yin par rtogs te /
translated: When they exist, they are produced at another time without relying on another cause, at that time it is understood that they are producers that rely on a transformation.

original: 'bras chan skye ba la phru ba la sogs pa bzhin no //
analyzed: 'bras chan skye ba la phru ba la sogs pa bzhin no //
translated: It is like a pot, etc. being the cause of the production of cooked rice.

original: des na sngar med pa 'ga' zhig ltar 'ga' zhig yod na 'gyur ba zhes bya ba ni rgyu med par 'thad pa ma yin te /
analyzed: des na sngar med pa 'ga' zhig ltar 'ga' zhig yod na 'gyur ba zhes bya ba ni rgyu med par 'thad pa ma yin te /
translated: Therefore, it is not tenable that something exists without a cause, as if it were something that previously did not exist.

original: de skyed pa'i @138b nus pa med par de ji ltar yang yod mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de skyed pa'i @138b nus pa med par de ji ltar yang yod mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is impossible for it to exist in any way without the power to produce it.

original: de bshad pa ni /
analyzed: de bshad pa ni /
translated: This is explained as follows:

original: 'bras bu nyid ma yin na rgyu ma yin pa las lan cig kyang mi 'byung ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'bras bu nyid ma yin na rgyu ma yin pa las lan cig kyang mi 'byung ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If it is not an effect, it does not arise even once from a non-cause.

original: gang zhig rang gi rgyu'i mthu las grub pa de ni glo bur du rgyu ma yin pa nye ba na yang yod pa yin te /
analyzed: gang zhig rang gi rgyu'i mthu las grub pa de ni glo bur du rgyu ma yin pa nye ba na yang yod pa yin te /
translated: That which is established from the power of its cause exists even when a non-cause is present,

original: dper na lhas byin yod pa na bum pa bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na lhas byin yod pa na bum pa bzhin no //
translated: like a vase that exists when Devadatta is present.

original: des na 'di la mthong ba gzhan la ltos pa med do //
analyzed: des na 'di la mthong ba gzhan la ltos pa med do //
translated: Therefore, in this case, seeing does not depend on another.

original: rgyu dang 'bras bu dag rang bzhin khyad par can gyi bdag nyid yin pas na lan cig zhugs pa'i mngon sum nyid kyis de ltar 'dzin pa'i phyir sngon po la sogs pa'i rang bzhin lta bu'o //
analyzed: rgyu dang 'bras bu dag rang bzhin khyad par can gyi bdag nyid yin pas na lan cig zhugs pa'i mngon sum nyid kyis de ltar 'dzin pa'i phyir sngon po la sogs pa'i rang bzhin lta bu'o //
translated: Since the cause and effect have a distinctive nature, they are apprehended in that way by a single instance of perception. Therefore, it is like the nature of blue, etc.

original: thams cad du sngon po sngon po nyid du rtogs pa la ltos pa lan cig dmigs pa zhugs pas de lta bu'i ngo bor mi rtogs pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: thams cad du sngon po sngon po nyid du rtogs pa la ltos pa lan cig dmigs pa zhugs pas de lta bu'i ngo bor mi rtogs pa ni ma yin no //
translated: In all cases, the cognition of blue as blue does not depend on the prior non-perception of blue, for it is not the case that one does not cognize it as such when one first perceives it.

original: des na rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po la ni lan cig dmigs pas rtogs par bya ba ma yin no //
analyzed: des na rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po la ni lan cig dmigs pas rtogs par bya ba ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, the relation of cause and effect is not to be known by a single perception.

original: des na snga na med pa'i rang bzhin thob pa ni rgyu la brten pa yin pas rgyu med par 'di'i rang gi ngo bo 'grub pa med do //
analyzed: des na snga na med pa'i rang bzhin thob pa ni rgyu la brten pa yin pas rgyu med par 'di'i rang gi ngo bo 'grub pa med do //
translated: Since the acquisition of a prior non-existence is dependent on a cause, without a cause, its own nature is not established.

original: de'i phyir gang zhig gang med na rnag gi ngo bo nyid med pa de ji ltar de la 'khrul par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de'i phyir gang zhig gang med na rnag gi ngo bo nyid med pa de ji ltar de la 'khrul par 'gyur te /
translated: Therefore, how can that which does not exist when something else does not exist be mistaken for it?

original: des na 'bras bu rgyu la 'khrul pa med do //
analyzed: des na 'bras bu rgyu la 'khrul pa med do //
translated: Thus, the effect is not mistaken for the cause.

original: des na de ltar rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po grub pa'i lhag ma nye bar bsgrubs te skabs kyi mdo 'grel par byed pa ni /
analyzed: des na de ltar rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po grub pa'i lhag ma nye bar bsgrubs te skabs kyi mdo 'grel par byed pa ni /
translated: Therefore, the remainder of the established relation of cause and effect is to be accomplished, and the present s≈´tra is to be explained.

original: 'bras bu yang zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: 'bras bu yang zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: The word ‚Äúalso‚Äù in the effect is for that reason.

original: 'bras bu rgyu med par yod na ni rgyu dang ni ldan pa kho na ste /
analyzed: 'bras bu rgyu med par yod na ni rgyu dang ni ldan pa kho na ste /
translated: If the effect existed without a cause, it would possess a cause.üîΩ

original: 'bras bu ma yin pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'bras bu ma yin pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: If the effect exists without a cause, it would be just endowed with a cause, but not an effect.

original: gtan tshigs bshad pa gang zhig ces bya ba ste /
analyzed: gtan tshigs bshad pa gang zhig ces bya ba ste /
translated: The reason is stated:

original: gang gi phyir gang zhig gang med par yod pa de ni de'i rgyu ma yin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir gang zhig gang med par yod pa de ni de'i rgyu ma yin pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because that which exists without this or that is not a cause of this or that,

original: sngar ma byung ba las yod pa nyid med pa'i phyir zhes bshad zin to //
analyzed: sngar ma byung ba las yod pa nyid med pa'i phyir zhes bshad zin to //
translated: because existence does not arise from what did not previously exist.

original: me med par yang du ba yod de /
analyzed: me med par yang du ba yod de /
translated: Smoke exists without fire,

original: de'i phyir 'di me yod pa sngon med pa yod pas thob pa ma yin pas na de yod pas skyes pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di me yod pa sngon med pa yod pas thob pa ma yin pas na de yod pas skyes pa ma yin no //
translated: therefore, since it exists without the prior existence of fire, it is not obtained by the existence of that, so it is not produced by the existence of that.

original: de bas na me du ba'i rgyu ma yin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bas na me du ba'i rgyu ma yin par 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, fire is not the cause of smoke.

original: de med kyang yod pa'i phyir me de'i rgyu ma yin mod /
analyzed: de med kyang yod pa'i phyir me de'i rgyu ma yin mod /
translated: It is not that fire is not the cause of that because it exists without that,

original: rgyu med pa nyid ni ma yin te /
analyzed: rgyu med pa nyid ni ma yin te /
translated: but it is not causeless,

original: gzhan gyi rgyu can yin pa'i phyir ro zhes dgos pa smras pa ni gal te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gzhan gyi rgyu can yin pa'i phyir ro zhes dgos pa smras pa ni gal te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: because it has another cause.

original: ma yin te gzhan de la yang mtshungs pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: ma yin te gzhan de la yang mtshungs pa'i phyir te /
translated: No, because that is the same for the other.

original: 'di ltar de med na yang me yod na yod pas so //
analyzed: 'di ltar de med na yang me yod na yod pas so //
translated: Because it exists when fire exists, even though it does not exist when fire does not exist.

original: ji ltar gzhan yod na yang yod pa'i phyir mi ldog pa'i chos can nyid kyis dngos po de yod pa'i rang bzhin yin @139a * //
analyzed: ji ltar gzhan yod na yang yod pa'i phyir mi ldog pa'i chos can nyid kyis dngos po de yod pa'i rang bzhin yin @139a * //
translated: Just as it is not the case that the nature of that thing exists because it exists when the other exists,

original: pa'i phyir me'i 'bras bu las 'das par 'gyur ba de bzhin du gzhan gyi 'bras bu nyid las kyang ngo //
analyzed: pa'i phyir me'i 'bras bu las 'das par 'gyur ba de bzhin du gzhan gyi 'bras bu nyid las kyang ngo //
translated: then it would be beyond the effect of fire, because it has the nature of existing by the non-reversal of its attribute.

original: me yod na yang de yod pa'i phyir 'di la snga na med pa'i yod pa thob pa'i skye ba'i don med pa'i phyir gzhan las kyang yod par mi 'thad do //
analyzed: me yod na yang de yod pa'i phyir 'di la snga na med pa'i yod pa thob pa'i skye ba'i don med pa'i phyir gzhan las kyang yod par mi 'thad do //
translated: And because it exists even when fire exists, it is not tenable that it exists from another, because it has no meaning of arising that obtains existence through prior non-existence.

original: don rnams kyi rgyu nyid ni 'ga' yang rang gi ngo bo las tha dad pa ma yin te /
analyzed: don rnams kyi rgyu nyid ni 'ga' yang rang gi ngo bo las tha dad pa ma yin te /
translated: The cause of things is not at all different from its own nature.

original: des na gal te me'i rnam pa nyid rgyu yin na /
analyzed: des na gal te me'i rnam pa nyid rgyu yin na /
translated: Therefore, if the form of fire itself is the cause,

original: 'o na ni gzhan gyi rnam pa nyid rgyu ma yin pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'o na ni gzhan gyi rnam pa nyid rgyu ma yin pa nyid do //
translated: then the form of another is not the cause.

original: de ste rnam pa gzhan rgyu yin na ni de lta na me'i rnam pa nyid du ba'i rgyu ma yin no //
analyzed: de ste rnam pa gzhan rgyu yin na ni de lta na me'i rnam pa nyid du ba'i rgyu ma yin no //
translated: If the other is the cause, then the form of fire is not the cause of smoke.

original: des na gzhan skyed par byed pa yin na de'am /
analyzed: des na gzhan skyed par byed pa yin na de'am /
translated: Therefore, if it generates the other, it is that,

original: de de ltar gyur pa yin na /
analyzed: de de ltar gyur pa yin na /
translated: or it is in that condition.

original: gzhan de skyed pa'i rang bzhin ma yin pa las ji ltar 'byung bar 'gyur /
analyzed: gzhan de skyed pa'i rang bzhin ma yin pa las ji ltar 'byung bar 'gyur /
translated: How could the other arise from that which is not the nature of generating it?

original: gtan tshigs bshad pa gang zhig rang gis skyed par byed pa'i rang bzhin ma yin pas de mi skyed pa'i phyir skye ba de rgyu med pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gtan tshigs bshad pa gang zhig rang gis skyed par byed pa'i rang bzhin ma yin pas de mi skyed pa'i phyir skye ba de rgyu med pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: Since the reason stated is not the nature of generating itself, it does not generate that. Therefore, that arising would be causeless.

original: gang gi tshe gcig skyed pa'i rang bzhin dang ldan pa las gzhan de skyed pa'i rang bzhin ma yin pa des na /
analyzed: gang gi tshe gcig skyed pa'i rang bzhin dang ldan pa las gzhan de skyed pa'i rang bzhin ma yin pa des na /
translated: When it possesses the nature of generating one thing, it is not the nature of generating the other.

original: der 'di yod pa rgyu med pa can du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: der 'di yod pa rgyu med pa can du 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, its existence there would be causeless.

original: de las bdag thob pa ni ma yin la /
analyzed: de las bdag thob pa ni ma yin la /
translated: It is not obtained from that,

original: de yod pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: de yod pa yang ma yin te /
translated: and it does not exist in that.

original: des na rgyu med pa nyid do //
analyzed: des na rgyu med pa nyid do //
translated: Therefore, it is causeless.

original: 'di de rgyu med pa can yod na gcig tu yang 'dir rgyu med pa can kho na'o //
analyzed: 'di de rgyu med pa can yod na gcig tu yang 'dir rgyu med pa can kho na'o //
translated: If it exists without a cause, it would be causeless in one place, and it would be causeless here as well.

original: des na de yang rgyur ma grub pas rgyu med pa can nyid do //
analyzed: des na de yang rgyur ma grub pas rgyu med pa can nyid do //
translated: Therefore, since it is not established as a cause, it is causeless.üîΩTo that we say: Smoke exists because

original: de la smras pa gang gis du ba ni yod pa nyid yin te /üîΩgang gi phyir gzhan yod pa na yang yod pa'i phyir khyim na yang yod la phyi rol na yang yod pa'i lhas byin bzhin du 'di der skyes pa ma yin par brjod pa gang zhig me yod pa na sngar med pa nyid las yod pas sngon med pa'i
analyzed: de la smras pa gang gis du ba ni yod pa nyid yin te / gang gi phyir gzhan yod pa na yang yod pa'i phyir khyim na yang yod la phyi rol na yang yod pa'i lhas byin bzhin du 'di der skyes pa ma yin par brjod pa gang zhig me yod pa na sngar med pa nyid las yod pas sngon med pa'i
translated: it exists when the other exists.üîΩSince it exists when the other exists, it is like Devadatta, who exists in the house and also exists outside. It is not said that he is not born there.

original: yod pa thob pa'i phyir skyes pa'i du ba de nyid ni ma yin te /
analyzed: yod pa thob pa'i phyir skyes pa'i du ba de nyid ni ma yin te /
translated: Since it exists from the state of nonexistence when fire exists, the smoke that is born is not that which obtains existence from the state of nonexistence.

original: 'on kyang de dang 'dra ba de dang mtshungs pa gzhan der 'byung ba yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang de dang 'dra ba de dang mtshungs pa gzhan der 'byung ba yin no //
translated: However, it is similar to that, it is like that, another arises there.

original: du ba gcig po de sngon ma byung ba las mes yod par bsgrub pa yin pa des na de la skye ba'i don 'thad pa /
analyzed: du ba gcig po de sngon ma byung ba las mes yod par bsgrub pa yin pa des na de la skye ba'i don 'thad pa /
translated: Since that one smoke is established as existing from the state of nonexistence when fire exists, the meaning of birth is tenable in that.

original: rgyu yang skyed par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: rgyu yang skyed par byed pa yin no //
translated: The cause is that which generates.

original: des na du ba de la rang bzhin de nyid skyed par byed pa yin la /
analyzed: des na du ba de la rang bzhin de nyid skyed par byed pa yin la /
translated: Therefore, that smoke is generated by that very nature.

original: du ba gzhan skyed pa ni gzhan kho na'o //
analyzed: du ba gzhan skyed pa ni gzhan kho na'o //
translated: Smoke is produced from another, but only from another of its own kind.

original: de'i phyir rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po 'thad pas rgyu med pa nyid du thal ba ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po 'thad pas rgyu med pa nyid du thal ba ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, since the relation of cause and effect is established, it is not the case that the absurd consequence follows that they are causeless.

original: 'bras bu yin pa'i phyir 'khrul pa med pa yin no zhes bya ba @139b gang yin pa de ni gsal ba yin no //
analyzed: 'bras bu yin pa'i phyir 'khrul pa med pa yin no zhes bya ba @139b gang yin pa de ni gsal ba yin no //
translated: The reason that the inference is nonerroneous because it is an effect is clear.

original: gang gi phyir 'di rang gi mtshan nyid gcig la ltos nas mi 'khrul par 'jog pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'di rang gi mtshan nyid gcig la ltos nas mi 'khrul par 'jog pa ni ma yin no //
translated: For it is not that it is posited as nonerroneous in dependence on a single particular.

original: gcig kho na las rjes su dpag pa mi 'jug pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: gcig kho na las rjes su dpag pa mi 'jug pa'i phyir te /
translated: Inference does not operate on the basis of a single particular.

original: de ni mthun pa'i phyogs la yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: de ni mthun pa'i phyogs la yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: For that would not exist in the similar class.

original: lan du mi 'dra ba las te ;
analyzed: lan du mi 'dra ba las te ;
translated: The response is that it is not similar.

original: mi mtshungs pa me ma yin pa'i rang bzhin las 'byung ba ji ltar de dang 'dra ba yin te 'di ltar /
analyzed: mi mtshungs pa me ma yin pa'i rang bzhin las 'byung ba ji ltar de dang 'dra ba yin te 'di ltar /
translated: How is it that it arises from a dissimilar, nonfire nature? In this way,

original: de ni de dang 'dra ba las 'byung ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de ni de dang 'dra ba las 'byung ba'i phyir /
translated: it arises from that which is similar to it.

original: ci 'dra ba zhig las lan cig du ba dmigs pa de dang mtshungs pa las 'byung ba'i phyir de dang 'dra bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: ci 'dra ba zhig las lan cig du ba dmigs pa de dang mtshungs pa las 'byung ba'i phyir de dang 'dra bar 'gyur te /
translated: It arises from a cause similar to that which is perceived as smoke, and therefore it is similar to that.

original: du ba nyid mtshungs par 'gyur ro ;
analyzed: du ba nyid mtshungs par 'gyur ro ;
translated: It is similar to smoke.

original: / don gcig rgyu ji lta bu las skyes pa'i gzhan kho na de dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: / don gcig rgyu ji lta bu las skyes pa'i gzhan kho na de dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro //
translated: How could another, which is a cause of the same object, arise from a cause that is similar to that?

original: 'dra ba zhes bya ba 'di ci zhig ce na /üîΩgcig po 'di ni du ba yin la /
analyzed: 'dra ba zhes bya ba 'di ci zhig ce na / gcig po 'di ni du ba yin la /
translated: What is this so-called similarity?

original: gzhan 'di yang du ba yin gyi bum pa ma yin pa gang yin pa de bstan par bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan 'di yang du ba yin gyi bum pa ma yin pa gang yin pa de bstan par bya'o //
translated: This one is smoke, and that one is also smoke, not a pot.

original: de 'dra ba las de 'dra ba nyid du 'gyur gyi gzhan 'dra ba ni ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di la rigs pa ci yod ce na /
analyzed: de 'dra ba las de 'dra ba nyid du 'gyur gyi gzhan 'dra ba ni ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di la rigs pa ci yod ce na /
translated: That which is similar to that arises from a cause that is similar to that, not from a cause that is dissimilar.üîΩWhat is the logic in this?

original: 'bras bu gzhan rigs mi mthun pa na rigs mthun pa'i rigs mthun pa dang mi mthun pa dag rgyu mtshan med par ni mi 'thad pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: 'bras bu gzhan rigs mi mthun pa na rigs mthun pa'i rigs mthun pa dang mi mthun pa dag rgyu mtshan med par ni mi 'thad pa ma yin nam /
translated: If the effect is different, of a different type, it is not tenable that a cause of the same type or a different type is the reason, without a reason.

original: dngos po ni de tsam gyi ngo bo yin pa'i phyir dngos po'i rgyu nyid de'i rgyu yin no zhes rigs so des na rgyu tha dad pas s'a lu dang nas kyi myu gu'i ngo bo nyid tha dad pa ni rgyu tha dad pa las yin la /
analyzed: dngos po ni de tsam gyi ngo bo yin pa'i phyir dngos po'i rgyu nyid de'i rgyu yin no zhes rigs so des na rgyu tha dad pas s'a lu dang nas kyi myu gu'i ngo bo nyid tha dad pa ni rgyu tha dad pa las yin la /
translated: Therefore, the difference in nature of rice and barley sprouts due to the difference in their causes is due to the difference in causes.

original: rgyu mtshungs pa can s'a lu'i myu gu dag gi gcig pa yang rgyu gcig pa las yin no //
analyzed: rgyu mtshungs pa can s'a lu'i myu gu dag gi gcig pa yang rgyu gcig pa las yin no //
translated: The sameness of rice sprouts due to their having the same cause is due to the same cause.

original: tha dad pas bskyed pa dag kyang ngo bo mtshungs na ni tha dad pa de'i rgyu med par 'gyur bas dngos po nyid rgyu med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: tha dad pas bskyed pa dag kyang ngo bo mtshungs na ni tha dad pa de'i rgyu med par 'gyur bas dngos po nyid rgyu med par 'gyur ro //
translated: If those generated by a difference have the same nature, then that difference would be causeless, and thus entities would be causeless.

original: 'dir smras pa 'dra ba dang mi 'dra ba dag rgyu mtshan dang bcas pa yin yang rigs mthun pa'i rgyu ni ma yin te /
analyzed: 'dir smras pa 'dra ba dang mi 'dra ba dag rgyu mtshan dang bcas pa yin yang rigs mthun pa'i rgyu ni ma yin te /
translated: Here, some say: Although similarities and dissimilarities have a reason, they are not homogeneous causes.

original: rigs mi mthun pa las skye yang rgyu med par thal ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rigs mi mthun pa las skye yang rgyu med par thal ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because even though they arise from a dissimilar type, it is not the case that they are necessarily causeless.

original: me las du ba ma yin pa las tha dad pa'i du ba skye bas na tha dad pa de nyid las skye ba yin no //
analyzed: me las du ba ma yin pa las tha dad pa'i du ba skye bas na tha dad pa de nyid las skye ba yin no //
translated: Since smoke arises from fire as different from non-fire, it arises from that very difference.

original: des na gal te me ma yin ba las kyang du ba ma yin pa las tha dad pa'i du bar 'gyur na /
analyzed: des na gal te me ma yin ba las kyang du ba ma yin pa las tha dad pa'i du bar 'gyur na /
translated: Therefore, if smoke were to arise from non-fire as different from non-smoke,

original: tha dad pa'i rgyu de yang spangs nas rgyu gzhan las kyang 'byung ba'i phyir rgyu 'khrul pas rgyu med pa nyid du 'gyur ro zhe na /üîΩma yin te mi 'khrul pa spangs na de'i rgyu can ma @140a * //
analyzed: tha dad pa'i rgyu de yang spangs nas rgyu gzhan las kyang 'byung ba'i phyir rgyu 'khrul pas rgyu med pa nyid du 'gyur ro zhe na / ma yin te mi 'khrul pa spangs na de'i rgyu can ma @140a * //
translated: then even though it is a different cause, it would arise from another cause, and thus, due to the confusion of cause, it would be causeless.

original: yin par mi 'khrul pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yin par mi 'khrul pa'i phyir ro //
translated: No, because if non-confusion is abandoned, it is not confused as not having that as its cause.üîΩThat which has that as its cause would be non-confused.

original: de'i rgyu can i de la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni da dung yang mi 'grub bo //
analyzed: de'i rgyu can i de la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni da dung yang mi 'grub bo //
translated: But that which is said to be non-confused has not yet been established.

original: des na 'khrul pa yin yang tha dad pa gyu med pa can ma yin no //
analyzed: des na 'khrul pa yin yang tha dad pa gyu med pa can ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, even if it is confused, it is not without a different cause.

original: des na mes bskyed pa'i du ba'i du ba ma yin pa las tha dad pa ni mes bskyed pa yin la /
analyzed: des na mes bskyed pa'i du ba'i du ba ma yin pa las tha dad pa ni mes bskyed pa yin la /
translated: Thus, the smoke generated by fire, which is different from non-smoke, is generated by fire.

original: de las gzhan gyis bskyed pa'i ni gzhan de las gzhan gyis bskyed pa kho na'o //
analyzed: de las gzhan gyis bskyed pa'i ni gzhan de las gzhan gyis bskyed pa kho na'o //
translated: That which is produced by something other than that is produced only by something other than that.

original: du ba'i rang gi ngo bo las ma gtogs pa'i tha dad pa zhes bya ba de nyid 'ga' yang med do //
analyzed: du ba'i rang gi ngo bo las ma gtogs pa'i tha dad pa zhes bya ba de nyid 'ga' yang med do //
