translated: If that which is abandoned in some place exists in another place, it is not dependent on that. It is possible to ascertain it in that way. ‚Äú That which is produced by those‚Äù is explained.

original: gang zhig gang gis byas pa'i phan pa la mi ltos pa de ni gzhan na med pa sngon du 'gro ba can der yod pa'i nges pa mi rung ba'i phyir de ltar yod pa nyid ltos pa yin no zhes rigs so //
analyzed: gang zhig gang gis byas pa'i phan pa la mi ltos pa de ni gzhan na med pa sngon du 'gro ba can der yod pa'i nges pa mi rung ba'i phyir de ltar yod pa nyid ltos pa yin no zhes rigs so //
translated: That which is not dependent on the benefit produced by that is not possible to ascertain as existing in that place, since it is preceded by the absence of another. Thus, it is correct to say that existence is dependent in that way.

original: de la ltos pa dang res 'ga' ba zhes bya ba ni don gzhan ma @146a * //
analyzed: de la ltos pa dang res 'ga' ba zhes bya ba ni don gzhan ma @146a * //
translated: The terms dependent and sometimes are not different in meaning.

original: yin no // de nyid kyi phyir 'di khyab par bya ba nyid du nye bar bkod pa ni ma yin gyi /
analyzed: yin no // de nyid kyi phyir 'di khyab par bya ba nyid du nye bar bkod pa ni ma yin gyi /
translated: Therefore, this is not cited as the pervasion,

original: 'on kyang de nyid res 'ga' ba yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang de nyid res 'ga' ba yin no //
translated: but rather that very [existence] is sometimes.

original: de bas na rgyu med pa nyid kyis ltos pa med pa de ltos pa dang bral ba nyid kyis res 'ga' ba ma yin pa'i phyir rtag tu yod pa'am med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bas na rgyu med pa nyid kyis ltos pa med pa de ltos pa dang bral ba nyid kyis res 'ga' ba ma yin pa'i phyir rtag tu yod pa'am med par 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, because of being causeless, it is independent. Because of being free from dependence, it is not sometimes. Therefore, it would be either always existent or always nonexistent.

original: 'o na ci'i phyir dgongs pa brjod pa na rgyu med pa nyid kyis 'di gzhan yod pa las 'da' bas rtag tu yod pa dang med par bstan par bya ba yin zhes brjod ce na /
analyzed: 'o na ci'i phyir dgongs pa brjod pa na rgyu med pa nyid kyis 'di gzhan yod pa las 'da' bas rtag tu yod pa dang med par bstan par bya ba yin zhes brjod ce na /
translated: If one asks, Why, when expressing the intention, is it said that because of being causeless, this is taught as always existent or nonexistent, by passing beyond existence from another?

original: dgongs pa 'di ma brjod na gang gis de ltar yod pa nyid ltos par brjod pa rung ba nyid kyi dbang gis de yul dang dus gzhan spangs nas gzhan na yod pa zhes bya ba de nyid mi 'grub bo //
analyzed: dgongs pa 'di ma brjod na gang gis de ltar yod pa nyid ltos par brjod pa rung ba nyid kyi dbang gis de yul dang dus gzhan spangs nas gzhan na yod pa zhes bya ba de nyid mi 'grub bo //
translated: If this intention is not expressed, then by the power of what is it proper to express existence in that way as dependent? By the power of that, the very existence in another place and time, having abandoned another place and time, is not established.

original: des na skabs 'dir dgongs pa 'di nyid yin te /
analyzed: des na skabs 'dir dgongs pa 'di nyid yin te /
translated: Therefore, the intended meaning in this context is as follows.

original: yul dang dus gzhan spangs nas gzhan yod pa ni de la brten nas yod pa thob pa yin te /
analyzed: yul dang dus gzhan spangs nas gzhan yod pa ni de la brten nas yod pa thob pa yin te /
translated: When an object is abandoned in another place and time, its existence in another place and time is obtained in dependence on that.

original: gzhan du na bzlog par 'gyur ba'i phyir zhes bya ba gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan du na bzlog par 'gyur ba'i phyir zhes bya ba gang yin pa'o //
translated: Otherwise, it would be the opposite.

original: bstan zin pa'i rigs pa 'di nyid gnyug ma'i don la nye bar sdud pa ni /
analyzed: bstan zin pa'i rigs pa 'di nyid gnyug ma'i don la nye bar sdud pa ni /
translated: This very reasoning that has been presented is applied to the meaning of the intrinsic nature.

original: gtan tshigs de bas na yul dang dus gzhan na med par yul dang dus de dag na yod pa ni yul dang dus nges pa nyid do //
analyzed: gtan tshigs de bas na yul dang dus gzhan na med par yul dang dus de dag na yod pa ni yul dang dus nges pa nyid do //
translated: The reason is: therefore, the existence in those places and times of what does not exist in other places and times is just the determination of place and time.

original: gtan tshigs de'i phyir ro //üîΩyul dang dus de'i rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa rjes su byed pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: gtan tshigs de'i phyir ro // yul dang dus de'i rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa rjes su byed pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The reason is that.üîΩIt is said that it follows the forward and reverse order of that place and time.

original: gang du lan cig mthong la zhes bya ba ni de'i rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i rjes su byed pa de la mthong ba yin no //
analyzed: gang du lan cig mthong la zhes bya ba ni de'i rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i rjes su byed pa de la mthong ba yin no //
translated: Where it is seen once means that it is seen in that place and time that follows the forward and reverse order.

original: des na de lta bur gyur pa'i der mthong ba ni yul dang dus der des par dmigs pa'i rang bzhin yin te /
analyzed: des na de lta bur gyur pa'i der mthong ba ni yul dang dus der des par dmigs pa'i rang bzhin yin te /
translated: Therefore, the seeing of such a thing is the nature of the definite perception of that thing at that place and time.

original: de ltar na sgrub par byed pa dang bcas pa'i rjes su 'gro ba dang dag nye bar bkod pa yin no //
analyzed: de ltar na sgrub par byed pa dang bcas pa'i rjes su 'gro ba dang dag nye bar bkod pa yin no //
translated: Thus, the concomitance and the counter-concomitance are established along with the proof.

original: ma tshang na ma mthong ba ni zhes bya bas ni zhes bya bas ni rgyu nges par 'dzin pa'i phyir des zhes bya ba ni gang du mthong ba de bzung ngo //
analyzed: ma tshang na ma mthong ba ni zhes bya bas ni zhes bya bas ni rgyu nges par 'dzin pa'i phyir des zhes bya ba ni gang du mthong ba de bzung ngo //
translated: As for the statement, ‚ÄúIf it is incomplete, it is not seen,‚Äù the word ‚Äúthat‚Äù refers to the place where it is seen.

original: sngon med pa yod pa thob pa 'di ni du ba 'di des bskyed pa yin no zhes bya bar nges par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sngon med pa yod pa thob pa 'di ni du ba 'di des bskyed pa yin no zhes bya bar nges par 'gyur ro //
translated: The non-existence of smoke prior to the existence of fire is ascertained, and it is ascertained that this smoke is generated by that fire.

original: yul dang dus dag gis ni dngos po mtshon pa yin no zhes bshad zin to //
analyzed: yul dang dus dag gis ni dngos po mtshon pa yin no zhes bshad zin to //
translated: It has been explained that place and time indicate the thing.

original: 'di yang bskyed par bya ba kho na la yod pa yin gyi /
analyzed: 'di yang bskyed par bya ba kho na la yod pa yin gyi /
translated: Moreover, this is only found in what is generated,

original: rgyu med pa la ma yin la /
analyzed: rgyu med pa la ma yin la /
translated: not in what is not a cause.

original: bya rog dang ta la sogs pa'i tshul du yang ma yin no zhes bshad pa ni /
analyzed: bya rog dang ta la sogs pa'i tshul du yang ma yin no zhes bshad pa ni /
translated: And it is not in the manner of a crow and a palm tree, etc.

original: gzhan du na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gzhan du na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is explained in the statement, ‚ÄúOtherwise.‚Äù

original: dngos po skyed par byed @146b pa'i cha 'dir lan cig zhugs pas kyang gzhan du srid pa mtha' dag 'gog par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dngos po skyed par byed @146b pa'i cha 'dir lan cig zhugs pas kyang gzhan du srid pa mtha' dag 'gog par 'gyur ro //
translated: Since it is the case that the factor that produces an entity is engaged in this one activity, it is also the case that all other entities are stopped.

original: 'di ltar skye ba ni 'di nyid yin bas na skye ba nyid bya rog dang ta la'i tshul du'am /üîΩrgyu med pa can du ni mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di ltar skye ba ni 'di nyid yin bas na skye ba nyid bya rog dang ta la'i tshul du'am / rgyu med pa can du ni mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Since this is the case, birth is not like the crow and the palm fruit, nor is it causeless.

original: des na rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po ni lan cig mthong bas rtogs par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: des na rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po ni lan cig mthong bas rtogs par bya ba yin no //
translated: Therefore, the relation of cause and effect is to be understood through the observation of a single instance.

original: lan cig rtogs pa des 'khrul pa med par yang sgrub par byed do zhes bshad pa ni /
analyzed: lan cig rtogs pa des 'khrul pa med par yang sgrub par byed do zhes bshad pa ni /
translated: The following verse is stated to show that the understanding of a single instance is also the means of establishing the absence of error.

original: de der nges pa yin na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de der nges pa yin na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If it is ascertained as that, then it is ascertained as that.

original: da la brten nas yod pa thob pa nyid kyis der nges pa yin no //
analyzed: da la brten nas yod pa thob pa nyid kyis der nges pa yin no //
translated: It is ascertained as that by the mere acquisition of existence in dependence on that.

original: des na 'di 'am de'i rigs can gzhan las kyang 'byung na ni de las yod pa thob pa ma yin no //
analyzed: des na 'di 'am de'i rigs can gzhan las kyang 'byung na ni de las yod pa thob pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, if it arises from this or from another of the same kind, then it is not the acquisition of existence from that.

original: de tsam gyis chog pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: de tsam gyis chog pa yang ma yin te /
translated: This is not sufficient, however.

original: 'on kyang rtag tu yod pa dang med par yang 'gyur te des na 'khrul pa med par 'grub bo //
analyzed: 'on kyang rtag tu yod pa dang med par yang 'gyur te des na 'khrul pa med par 'grub bo //
translated: But it would also be both permanent and impermanent, and so it would be established as nonerroneous.

original: de ste gzhan las byung na de'i phyir 'byung ba ni de du ba ma yin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ste gzhan las byung na de'i phyir 'byung ba ni de du ba ma yin par 'gyur ro //
translated: If it arises from another, then the arising would not be smoke.

original: de bzhin du de dang rigs mi mthun pa'i dngos po yang dngos po gzhan la yod pa 'grub pa dang 'brel pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du de dang rigs mi mthun pa'i dngos po yang dngos po gzhan la yod pa 'grub pa dang 'brel pa ni ma yin no //
translated: In the same way, a thing that is not of the same type as that is not related to the existence of another thing.

original: des na du ba'i rang gi ngo bo gcig las thob par rtogs pa na /
analyzed: des na du ba'i rang gi ngo bo gcig las thob par rtogs pa na /
translated: Therefore, when the nature of smoke is understood to be obtained from one thing,

original: rigs pas dngos po gzhan las srid pa ma yin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rigs pas dngos po gzhan las srid pa ma yin par 'gyur ro //
translated: it is not possible by reasoning to be from another thing.

original: ci ste mthong ba yin na des de du ba las gzhan nyid yin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ci ste mthong ba yin na des de du ba las gzhan nyid yin par 'gyur ro //
translated: If it is seen, then it would be different from smoke.

original: rigs pa ni skye ba'i rang bzhin dpyad pa nyid du bstan zin to //
analyzed: rigs pa ni skye ba'i rang bzhin dpyad pa nyid du bstan zin to //
translated: The reasoning has already been explained in the analysis of the nature of arising.

original: rigs pa gzhan yang bshad pa ni du ba ni des bskyed pa'i zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rigs pa gzhan yang bshad pa ni du ba ni des bskyed pa'i zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Another reasoning is stated: ‚ÄúSmoke is that which is produced by fire.‚Äù

original: du ba ni me des bskyed pa de yod na 'byung ba'i rang bzhin gyi khyad par yin no //
analyzed: du ba ni me des bskyed pa de yod na 'byung ba'i rang bzhin gyi khyad par yin no //
translated: Smoke is produced by that fire. Its existence is a particular nature of arising.

original: ji ltar du ba de yod na yod pas nye bar mtshon pa'i rang bzhin yin pa de bzhin du rgyu med kyang 'bras bu du ba'i mtshan nyid bskyed pa'i rang bzhin yin no //
analyzed: ji ltar du ba de yod na yod pas nye bar mtshon pa'i rang bzhin yin pa de bzhin du rgyu med kyang 'bras bu du ba'i mtshan nyid bskyed pa'i rang bzhin yin no //
translated: Just as smoke is characterized by the nature of being existent when fire is existent, in the same way, even without a cause, the effect is characterized by the nature of generating smoke.

original: gang yod na du ba'i rang gi ngo bo yod par 'gyur ba de ni me yin no //
analyzed: gang yod na du ba'i rang gi ngo bo yod par 'gyur ba de ni me yin no //
translated: That which, when existent, the nature of smoke becomes existent, is fire.

original: 'di skad brjod pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di skad brjod pa yin te /
translated: This is what is being said:

original: don rnams kyi bskyed bya skyed byed kyi dngos po dang / nus pa dang / skye ba ni rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i rang bzhin yin no //
analyzed: don rnams kyi bskyed bya skyed byed kyi dngos po dang / nus pa dang / skye ba ni rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i rang bzhin yin no //
translated: The production of objects, the relationship of producer and produced, the capacity, and the arising have the nature of positive and negative concomitance.

original: rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa yang dngos po'i rang bzhin gi ngo bo las dngos po gzhan du gyur pa ma yin te /
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa yang dngos po'i rang bzhin gi ngo bo las dngos po gzhan du gyur pa ma yin te /
translated: Positive and negative concomitance are not different from the nature of the essence of things.

original: des na me yod na du ba yod pa zhes bya ba ni mo'i rnam pa'i rang gi ngo bo yod na du ba'i rnam pa'i rang gi ngo bo yod pa yin no //
analyzed: des na me yod na du ba yod pa zhes bya ba ni mo'i rnam pa'i rang gi ngo bo yod na du ba'i rnam pa'i rang gi ngo bo yod pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, when fire exists, smoke exists means that when the nature of the form of fire exists, the nature of the form of smoke exists.

original: de bas na du bskyed par byed pa zhes bya ba ni du ba rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i rjes su @147a * //üîΩbyed pa yin la /
analyzed: de bas na du bskyed par byed pa zhes bya ba ni du ba rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i rjes su @147a * // byed pa yin la /
translated: Therefore, the statement ‚Äúsmoke is produced‚Äù is a statement that smoke conforms to and is concomitant with fire.

original: du ba'i mes skyed par byed pa zhes bya ba yang de'i rjes su byed pa kho na'o //
analyzed: du ba'i mes skyed par byed pa zhes bya ba yang de'i rjes su byed pa kho na'o //
translated: The statement ‚Äúsmoke is produced by fire‚Äù is also a statement that smoke conforms to fire.

original: de dag kyang de dag nyid kyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir du ba'i rnam pa nyid ni mes bskyed par bya ba yin la /
analyzed: de dag kyang de dag nyid kyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir du ba'i rnam pa nyid ni mes bskyed par bya ba yin la /
translated: Since these two are the nature of smoke, the form of smoke is what is produced by fire.

original: me'i rnam pa nyid kyang du ba'i skyed par byed pa yang me yin no //
analyzed: me'i rnam pa nyid kyang du ba'i skyed par byed pa yang me yin no //
translated: Since fire is the producer of smoke, fire is what produces smoke.

original: des na 'dir du ba nyid mes bskyed par bya ba nyid dang / me nyid du ba skyed par byed pa yin pas na mi 'khrul pa sgrub par byed pa gzhan mi dgos te /
analyzed: des na 'dir du ba nyid mes bskyed par bya ba nyid dang / me nyid du ba skyed par byed pa yin pas na mi 'khrul pa sgrub par byed pa gzhan mi dgos te /
translated: Therefore, in this case, since smoke is what is produced by fire and fire is what produces smoke, there is no need for any other proof of non-error.

original: byas pa las mi rtag pa nyid bzhin no //üîΩmes bskyed par bya ba ni du ba nyid yin la /
analyzed: byas pa las mi rtag pa nyid bzhin no // mes bskyed par bya ba ni du ba nyid yin la /
translated: This is similar to the case of the proof that whatever is produced is impermanent.üîΩSmoke is what is produced by fire.

original: du ba skyed par byed pa yang me nyid yin no //
analyzed: du ba skyed par byed pa yang me nyid yin no //
translated: Fire is what produces smoke.
